Plot: One morning, Lily and Ben wake up side by side in bodies that are not theirs. And Magalie, a little girl in the body of a tall, bearded, awaits them in the guest room. This is the beginning...
Title: Les dissociés
Writer: Raphaël Descraques, Julien Josselin, Vincent Tirel
Actors: Raphaël Descraques, Julien Josselin, Vincent Tirel, Quentin Bouissou
